decks.notes: The deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard with powerful creatures like Griselbrand and Emrakul, then using spells like Reanimate and Animate Dead to bring them back into play for a game-winning combo. It also includes disruption spells like Thoughtseize and Cabal Therapy to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The deck aims to efficiently reanimate big threats while controlling the opponent's resources, making it a potent and versatile combo deck in the Legacy format.

This deck aims to disrupt opponents' strategies by locking down their nonbasic lands with cards like Blood Moon and Magus of the Moon, while also using Chalice of the Void to hinder their spells. By ramping into these disruptive cards quickly with cards like Simian Spirit Guide and Chrome Mox, the deck can overwhelm opponents with powerful creatures like Pyrogoyf and Fury. With a focus on fast-paced aggression and disruption, this deck aims to control the board and secure victories through efficient plays and strategic resource management.

This deck focuses on quickly milling cards from your library to get your combo pieces into the graveyard, then utilizing cards like Dread Return and Reanimate to bring back powerful creatures like Balustrade Spy and Jack-o'-Lantern for a game-winning combo. With plenty of disruption and protection spells such as Pact of Negation and Cabal Therapy, the deck aims to quickly assemble its combo pieces and win the game before the opponent has a chance to respond. The use of cards like Lotus Petal and Dark Ritual help to accelerate the deck's game plan and ensure explosive turns.

The main focus of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with fast and aggressive Goblin creatures in order to deal quick and efficient damage. By utilizing cards like Goblin Lackey to cheat out creatures, Aether Vial to put more pressure on the board, and various other Goblin support cards, this deck aims to maintain a steady stream of threats while disrupting the opponent's game plan with cards like Wasteland and Rishadan Port. The goal is to quickly build a board presence and finish off the opponent before they can stabilize.

The deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard with powerful creatures using cards like Entomb and Reanimate, then bringing them back into play for a strong early game advantage. It also includes cards like Force of Will for protection, along with disruption cards like Daze and Thoughtseize to control the opponent's strategy. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with powerful creatures like Atraxa, Grand Unifier and Archon of Cruelty, while also having backup plans with Troll of Khazad-d√ªm and Brazen Borrower. The deck aims to win with a fast and aggressive combo strategy.

The main concept of this deck is to generate as much mana as possible using cards like Fell the Profane, Chrome Mox, and Lotus Petal, while also disrupting the opponent's hand with Thoughtseize and Duress. The goal is to assemble the necessary cards for a powerful storm combo, utilizing cards like Tendrils of Agony and Lion's Eye Diamond. Additionally, cards like Echo of Eons and Gaea's Will provide additional card advantage and flexibility. The deck also includes efficient creature removal with Orcish Bowmasters and disruption with Cabal Therapy. Overall, the deck aims to quickly and efficiently win the game through a storm combo.
